00001.Label: The Dark Knight, Action, Superhero
00001.Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.
00001.Title: The Dark Knight
00001.About: A masterpiece of filmmaking that redefined superhero movies. Directed by Christopher Nolan, this film explores the thin line between hero and vigilante.

00002.Label: Inception, Sci-Fi, Thriller
00002.Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
00002.Title: Inception
00002.About: A mind-bending science fiction thriller that takes you deep into the world of dreams within dreams. Christopher Nolan's masterful direction creates a complex narrative.

00003.Label: Avengers Endgame, Action, Marvel
00003.Description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.
00003.Title: Avengers: Endgame
00003.About: The epic conclusion to the Infinity Saga that brings together over a decade of Marvel Cinematic Universe storytelling in an emotional and action-packed finale.

00004.Label: Interstellar, Sci-Fi, Drama
00004.Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
00004.Title: Interstellar
00004.About: A scientifically ambitious film that explores love, sacrifice, and the survival of humanity across the cosmos. Features stunning visuals and emotional depth.

00005.Label: The Matrix, Sci-Fi, Action
00005.Description: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is actually a simulation, and he must join a rebellion to free humanity.
00005.Title: The Matrix
00005.About: A revolutionary sci-fi film that introduced groundbreaking visual effects and philosophical questions about reality, perception, and free will.

00006.Label: Pulp Fiction, Crime, Drama
00006.Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
00006.Title: Pulp Fiction
00006.About: Quentin Tarantino's masterpiece that revolutionized independent cinema with its non-linear narrative and memorable characters.

00007.Label: Forrest Gump, Drama, Comedy
00007.Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.
00007.Title: Forrest Gump
00007.About: A heartwarming tale of an extraordinary man who witnesses and influences several historical events while pursuing his childhood love.

00008.Label: The Godfather, Crime, Drama
00008.Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.
00008.Title: The Godfather
00008.About: Francis Ford Coppola's epic tale of power, family, and loyalty in the world of organized crime. Widely considered one of the greatest films ever made.

00009.Label: Titanic, Romance, Drama
00009.Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
00009.Title: Titanic
00009.About: James Cameron's epic romance and disaster film that became a cultural phenomenon and won 11 Academy Awards.

00010.Label: Avatar, Sci-Fi, Adventure
00010.Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
00010.Title: Avatar
00010.About: A visually stunning film that pushed the boundaries of 3D technology and environmental storytelling in cinema.

00011.Label: Gladiator, Action, Historical
00011.Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
00011.Title: Gladiator
00011.About: Ridley Scott's epic historical drama starring Russell Crowe as a fallen general who becomes a gladiator seeking revenge.

00012.Label: The Shawshank Redemption, Drama
00012.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
00012.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
00012.About: A powerful story of hope, friendship, and resilience set within the walls of Shawshank State Penitentiary.
